data.text: @JGBPOV3 Wow, that is a lot to take in. Try to keep it in perspective if you can. A lot to ask, I know but there is room in there for hope.

I went to my new Cardiologist for a
Stress Test today & he says I have
heart damage & my heart is enlarged
& he believes I will inevitably need heart surgery as a consequence!
😥John☮️ https://t.co/hZkoy0fWmM

@shadowthorn69 I went to my new Cardiologist for a
Stress Test today & he says I have
heart damage & my heart is enlarged
& he believes I will inevitably need heart surgery as a consequence!
😥John☮️ https://t.co/P9g0TIQjVG
@JGBPOV3 How did it go? How are you?
@JGBPOV3 Im sure you must be. It had to be exhausting and discouraging.
@indianaboognish I’m just so tired of being sick 😥 https://t.co/AH0fDKx97p
@JGBPOV3 I understand. All you can do is try to be brave. But there is no shame in being afraid.

@indianaboognish Thank you
I’m really scared 😥 https://t.co/bX6wXySx7B
@JGBPOV3 Good luck, my friend. I’ll be thinking of you. I’m very hopeful it will be okay!
